reviews.title: RIP OFF
reviews.comment: I agree with others who left a review. ....bonus coins are not credited....boots me off often.  I do not recommend
reviews.author: Brenda Patwell

reviews.title: Avoid
reviews.comment: I recently downloaded this game at first it looked great but lost all my chips because winning hands barely show and if it does all you get is a high pair like two aces or kings don\'t waste your time and money with this app...AVOID.
reviews.author: Daniel Mcintosh

reviews.title: Winning hands are few and far between..
reviews.comment: It\'s ok to pass some time. Wish you could play offline. More winning hands and some bonus rounds would be nice.
reviews.author: KRISTYNA VEGA

reviews.title: No money
reviews.comment: You loose just about every hand. Then have to wait hours for a coin bonus. And bet small to make it last.
reviews.author: Danielle Plasket

reviews.title: 5 minutes
reviews.comment: It only took me 5 minutes to lose all my chips. Very bad game unless you like losing.
reviews.author: Joey Maples

reviews.title: good game, bronwyn kemp
reviews.comment: I decided to try this video poker game and it is a good one you aren\'t waiting a day to get bonus chips I have won a few good hands too few different versions to get to which will be ok thanx
reviews.author: bronwyn kemp

reviews.title: Time Killer
reviews.comment: I really enjoy playing this poker game on my breaks, wish I was better at poker... also wish I had better luck
reviews.author: Dave Mc

reviews.comment: Video Poker- This game is the bomb! Reminds me of the poker machines in Reno. Highly recommend this game. Thank you for the many hours of fun!!!\tAwesome game! Gameplay is just like casino poker machines. I\'d like to see a blackjack game like this style.
reviews.author: Jerry Beal

reviews.title: Bad experience
reviews.comment: I had all my levels unlocked with 20,000 chips I hit for a flush on a 5000 bet which pays 30,000 in the middle of the payout game froze & reset if not for that 5 stars all the way
reviews.author: Andy Muccino

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: My experience on this game has gotting alot better on here or if its just poker night with a couple of friends. I recommended this game to all my friends. Thanks. Bolostinson@gmail.com
reviews.author: Bolo Stinson

reviews.title: Pass time
reviews.comment: Good if your bored need lots of improvements better bouns better ods but heck pass time is great
reviews.author: jake blitz

reviews.title: Challenging and fun
reviews.comment: Addictive, good practice for live gaming. As with others wish time to collect bonus was shorter.
reviews.author: Julia Graham-Bailey

reviews.title: excelent!
reviews.comment: un joc foarte bun si antrenant! demult cautam un joc de pocker similar cu cel de la ,,aparate\".
reviews.author: Olteanu Andreea

reviews.title: Ron
reviews.comment: Best out there. Keep it up!
reviews.author: Kieron Ellison

reviews.title: Video Poker
reviews.comment: Great game to play and passes the time.
reviews.author: quenna Cons

reviews.title: Runs great
reviews.comment: Some bigger wins would be good,its hard get a hand above three of a kind
reviews.author: alan dempsey

reviews.title: Love the style and quality graphics
reviews.comment: Love the graphics! Like the game play too! Best poker for me specialy since im a super hero fan!
reviews.author: Joe Pinedo

reviews.title: Video poker
reviews.comment: I love this game its fun
reviews.author: James Clay

reviews.title: Amesome game!!!
reviews.comment: Play you will enjoy
reviews.author: Mark Oddy

reviews.title: Great concept, but not fun for long enough.
reviews.comment: You never seem to win...  Your forced to play in Kings or Better for a long long time, long enough that I\'ve had the game for a week and still haven\'t unlocked the second set of games.  200 credits go like water.  Just not able to get in and have a fun gaming session.  Not even a worthwhile time waster.
reviews.author: Josh Basarab
